visualizations.title: Correlation Matrix
visualizations.description: Key relationships: salesperson_id & sales_value (positive, 0.02), sales_value & salesperson_id (positive, 0.02), sales_quantity & sales_value (positive, 0.02)

recommendations: Address the 9.9% decline in salesperson_id by investigating root causes and implementing corrective measures.
Address the 61.4% decline in sales_value by investigating root causes and implementing corrective measures.
Capitalize on the 136.1% growth in sales_quantity by identifying the key drivers and reinforcing those factors.
Learn from the success of the Africa segment and apply those lessons to improve performance in the underperforming Europe segment.
Consider performing a detailed profitability analysis by product/service line to identify optimization opportunities.
